body: Although the mockup has the listing page on it, I think we should focus more on the detail page. The listing page is something we'll be working on separately, and likely won't be a part of this change.
body_text: Although the mockup has the listing page on it, I think we should focus more on the detail page. The listing page is something we'll be working on separately, and likely won't be a part of this change.
